# Bloks

**Website:** https://www.bloks.app/  
**Category:** AI-Powered Relationship Intelligence & Meeting Assistant  
**Company:** Bloks, Inc. (Cantley, QC, Canada)

## Support Contact
- **Email:** support@bloks.app
- **Phone:** +1 613-851-4343
- **Support Page:** https://www.bloks.app/support

## Product Overview

Bloks is an AI-powered relationship intelligence platform designed for relationship-driven professionals. It automatically captures, organizes, and analyzes information from calls, emails, documents, and web sources to create a comprehensive knowledge base for every client relationship. The platform operates locally on your device (no meeting bots required), offering studio-grade recording quality with automatic meeting detection and transcription.

---

## Pricing Tiers

| Tier | Monthly (Annual) | Monthly (Monthly) | Best For |
|------|------------------|-------------------|----------|
| **Free Trial** | $0 | $0 | 7-day trial, full features |
| **Premium** | $69/user | $89/user | Individuals & small teams |
| **Enterprise** | Contact Sales | Contact Sales | Large teams with compliance needs |

### Pricing Notes
- **Free Trial:** 7-day full-feature trial, no credit card required
- **Annual Commitment:** Save $20/month per user ($828/year vs $1,068/year)
- **User Limits:** None specified (per-user pricing model)
- **Billing:** Consolidated team billing available (Premium and Enterprise)
- **Free Tier:** Not available (trial converts to paid subscription)

---

## Key Features

### Core Capabilities (All Tiers)

**Smart Capture:**
- AutoPilot automatic conversation capture (Zoom, Teams, Meet, Slack, Webex)
- Studio-grade audio recording quality
- Auto-start/stop (detects when meetings begin/end)
- In-person meeting capture via mobile app (iOS/Android)
- Manual notes and screenshot highlights during calls
- Speaker identification
- Multi-lingual transcription and summaries

**Meeting Intelligence:**
- AI-generated meeting summaries with customizable templates
- Post-meeting transcripts with timestamps
- Meeting highlights (screenshots + conversation context)
- Action items and task extraction
- Note transformation (AI reformats any content)
- Summary sharing (send to anyone, Bloks account not required)
- Template library (personal and shared team templates)

**Relationship Intelligence:**
- Self-organizing knowledge base (auto-maps notes/emails/docs to people/companies)
- 360Â° People Briefs (dynamic profiles enriched from all sources)
- Company Snapshots (metrics, insights, stakeholders)
- Pre-meeting Event Briefs (context from past interactions)
- Auto-tagging (events, people, companies)
- Timeline view of all interactions

**Ask Bloks (Relationship ChatGPT):**
- Natural language search across all meetings, contacts, and documents
- Conversational follow-ups ("What did I promise Acme?")
- Deep-dive contact queries (personality, emails, LinkedIn data)
- Network-wide searches ("Who mentioned the Toronto conference?")

**Platform Support:**
- Desktop: Mac, Windows
- Mobile: iOS, Android
- Calendar: Google Workspace, Microsoft Office 365 (multi-account support)

**Security & Compliance:**
- SOC2 Certified Infrastructure
- End-to-End Encryption (TLS 1.2+ transit, AES-256 at rest)
- Data Residency Compliance (Canada, U.S., Europe)
- FINRA/SEC compliant (financial regulations)
- Private data (never shared, never used for AI training)

---

### Advanced Features (Premium & Enterprise)

**CRM Integrations:**
- Native integrations: Salesforce, Affinity, Wealthbox, HubSpot (beta), Microsoft Dynamics 365
- One-click CRM push (attach summaries or extracted data)
- See-before-sync (preview every CRM update before applying)
- Auto-create records or update existing contacts/companies
- CRM-ready structured data extraction

**Team Collaboration:**
- Shared knowledge base (team access to meeting notes and insights)
- Shared relationship insights (pool intelligence across team)
- Consistent team workflows with shared templates
- Team admin panel (user/role management)
- Consolidated billing

**Unlimited Access:**
- Unlimited meeting briefs and summaries
- Unlimited people and company briefs
- Unlimited "Ask Bloks" queries
- Unlimited transcript storage

---

### Enterprise-Only Features

**Compliance & Control:**
- Audit Trail (greater compliance for regulated industries)
- Flexible billing and seat management
- Centralized team controls (permissions, roles, invoices)

**Support & Onboarding:**
- Dedicated account manager
- Priority onboarding
- Priority support (12-hour response time vs standard support)

---

## Limitations

**Free Trial:**
- 7-day time limit (full features available during trial)
- Converts to paid Premium plan after trial ends

**Premium Tier:**
- No dedicated account manager (Enterprise only)
- No audit trail feature (Enterprise only)
- Standard support response time (not 12-hour priority)

**Platform:**
- CRM integrations limited to supported platforms (Salesforce, Affinity, Wealthbox, HubSpot, Dynamics)
- HubSpot integration currently in beta
- Meeting platform support limited to Zoom, Teams, Meet, Slack, Webex (no mention of GoToMeeting, BlueJeans, etc.)

**Data & Privacy:**
- Regional data hosting available (Canada, U.S., Europe) but requires configuration
- No on-premise deployment option mentioned
